DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Deathknight when:

  • They have Obliteration talented and Pillar of Frost is active (if they use that talent).
  • They have Breath of Sindragosa talented and it's active, while Pillar of Frost is active (if used).
  • They don't use Obliteration or Breath of Sindragosa, and Pillar of Frost is active (if talented into it).
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Deathknight when:

  • Summon Gargoyle is active and has ≤22 seconds remaining.
  • The DK uses Army of the Dead (without Summon Gargoyle) with an active Abomination (if talented) under 18 seconds remaining or Army Ghouls with ≤18 seconds left.
  • The DK does not use Summon Gargoyle or Army of the Dead, and Dark Transformation is active.
  • Dark Transformation is active and the DK does not use Summon Gargoyle (regardless of other talents).
  • Summon Gargoyle is on cooldown for a duration that exceeds Power Infusion's buff time when adding 10 seconds (prioritizing next Gargoyle).
  • Three or more enemies are present while Dark Transformation is active or Death and Decay is ticking.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demonhunter when:

  • They activate Metamorphosis, as this aligns with their primary damage window.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds to maximize value before the fight concludes.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • Their Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune is active, boosting their major damage window.
  • They are casting Convoke the Spirits to amplify burst damage potential.
  • Their core offensive cooldowns are synced with a planned Bloodlust/Heroism timing.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • The Feral Druid has Berserk active during their burst window.
  • The Feral Druid does not have the Heart of the Lion talent selected in their build.
EVOKER_DEVASTATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Devastation Evoker when:

  • The Evoker's Dragonrage is active, and either their Shattering Star is on cooldown, the target is affected by Shattering Star's debuff, or there are 2 or more enemies.
  • The remaining fight duration is less than 35 seconds.
HUNTER_MARKSMANSHIP:
Use Power Infusion on the Marksmanship Hunter when:

  • Their Trueshot buff has more than 12 seconds remaining, ensuring maximum alignment with their burst window.
  • The fight will end in less than 13 seconds, to avoid wasting the cooldown before the encounter concludes.
HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • The Hunter is actively using Coordinated Assault.
  • The Hunter does not have Coordinated Assault and Spearhead is on cooldown.
  • The Hunter has neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talents selected.
MAGE_ARCANE:
Use Power Infusion on the Arcane Mage when:

  • The mage does not have Spymaster's Web equipped and has just cast Arcane Surge.
  • The mage has Spymaster's Web equipped and has just cast Evocation.
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Their Combustion is about to come off cooldown (within the pre-cast window).
  • They already have Combustion active with more than 7 seconds remaining.
  • The encounter will end in less than 20 seconds.
MAGE_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Mage when:

  • Power Infusion is not currently active.
MONK_WINDWALKER:
Use Power Infusion on the Windwalker Monk when:

  • The Windwalker Monk's Xuen is active and Bloodlust is not active.
  • The Windwalker Monk's Xuen is active, Bloodlust is active, and Strike of the Windlord is on cooldown.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • They activate Avenging Wrath, their primary damage cooldown
  • They use Crusade (if specced into this talent)
  • Your target is affected by their Execution Sentence debuff
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • They are in Voidform and Power Infusion is not active.
  • They have activated Dark Ascension and Power Infusion is not active.
  • They have the Twilight's Wrath 4-piece set bonus and Power Infusion is not active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • They have an active Deathmark effect on their target, as this maximizes burst potential during their strongest damage window.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • The Rogue has Shadow Dance active, enhancing their abilities during this window.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • The Shaman is currently under the effect of Ascendance (their primary burst cooldown).
  • Ascendance has over 30 seconds remaining on its cooldown (to align with alternative burst windows).
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • The Shaman has Ascendance active.
  • The Shaman has Feral Spirit active.
  • The Shaman has Doom Winds active.
  • The encounter is within the final 20 seconds of any 2-minute window (e.g., 1:40–2:00, 3:40–4:00).
  • The Shaman’s earliest available talent cooldown is at least 2 minutes away.
  • The Shaman has not selected Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds talents.
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • The warlock has all relevant major offensive cooldowns active, specifically during cycles where they activate Summon Darkglare to maximize damage amplification during their burst window.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • The warlock's imps are about to despawn within 2 global cooldowns plus the time to cast Summon Demonic Tyrant.
  • They have just cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination (their previous ability).
  • Either the imp despawn is within 1 global cooldown plus the Tyrant's cast time or they have less than 2 Soul Shards.
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Summon Infernal is active during the encounter.
  • They have not selected the Summon Infernal talent, requiring alignment with their core rotation.
  • The encounter’s remaining duration is shorter than the time needed to use Summon Infernal again, ensuring Power Infusion is utilized before the fight ends.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • Colossus Smash is active on the target and the encounter has over 135 seconds remaining.
  • The Warrior is in the Execute phase and has Avatar active.
  • The encounter is in its final 25 seconds.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • Their Avatar buff has more than 15 seconds remaining and the encounter duration allows full utilization of the cooldown.
  • They are in the Execute phase (sub-20% target health) while Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, ensuring final burst damage optimization.
